name: Jaiparkash Yadav
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

certifications.title: Machine Learning Foundations: A Case Study Approach

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Skin Vision (AI based Personalized Skincare Ecommerce Platform)
projects.description: Designed and developed an AI Platform to suggest the recommended Products based on the detected skin issue using object detection. Trained YOLOv8 model on 20k+ instances of skin lesion across 500 images. Developed Rule-Based Approach for Product Recommendation. Developed user authentication and authorization features, allowing registered users to use the platform and utilize add to cart feature.

projects.name: Number Plate Recognition
projects.description: Implemented number plate recognition system using YOLO model for enhanced accuracy and speed. Trained the model on 400+ images of Number plates and got almost 73.4%.

projects.name: Surveillance Rover with Artificial Intelligence
projects.description: Developed a surveillance rover with real-time human detection capabilities. Implemented the Mobilenet model architecture for real-time human detection. Implemented Socket programming to trigger alarms and send alerts upon human detection.

experiences.description: Worked on Model Quantization using hailo framework. Worked on Development of No-Code Platform for the Automatic model conversion from ONNX to har, hef and openvino formats. Worked on different OCR models for NPR system like PaddleOCR. Worked on Resnet ReID, YOLOv5, YOLOv6, YOLOv8 models. Developed machine learning algorithms and computer vision techniques using Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV for drone image recognition and tracking. Conducted data preprocessing and model optimization to improve accuracy and efficiency, utilizing data augmentation and hyperparameter tuning. Contributed to team meetings for development of product.

experiences.company_name: IDR Research and Development Pvt. Ltd.
